item.description:
What a perfect way for you to enjoy your weekend without guilt! Bring your dog to our fenced in yard for a few hours on the first Saturday of every month and watch your pet interact with many other friendly dog owners and their pets. Enjoy some coffee and donuts while you provide your pet with some social activity and lots of much needed exercise.

The size of the group varies week to week- but we usually see 10-25 regulars as well as newcomers. If your pet is friendly - WELCOME!

group.name: The Bethany Friendly Dog Meetup Group

item.name: FUN, FREE, and Popular Doggie 'Park' Social
